text: RT @chrislhayes Got a dispatch today from someone that visited the the MDC Federal Prison in Brooklyn where there was ***no hand sanitizer or soap*** and a guard begged the visitor to send word that they are in danger if the virus hits the facility.

As my mother always used to say, “you may be the first to do many things, but make sure you are not the last.”

On #InternationalWomensDay, let’s recognize the sacrifices of all the extraordinary women who came before us and continue their fight for equality and representation.

No single racial or ethnic group is more susceptible to coronavirus. There is no excuse for discrimination against Asian Americans and Asian immigrants, period. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1236056515481604096/img/s5bGGOiPJ1XzrK6q.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1236056515481604096/vid/320x320/EkOgRelvo9wdog8V.mp4?tag=13

At the end of the day, it is not necessarily true that building more guns, tanks, and missiles is the only way we will be safe.

We will be safer when people around the world get to know each other and understand the humanity they have in common.

RT @swalker06 Spotted Lori Parks, the niece of civil rights legend Rosa Parks at a Bernie Sanders canvass launch in Detroit. 

When I thanked her for volunteering for Bernie she responded, “There’s no other choice. Bernie’s been fighting for us for years. It’s time we fight for him.” #NotMeUs http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESnIIAdWoAAxXMp.jpg

Women must have full control over their reproductive health. They must have equal pay for equal work: the whole damn dollar, not 79 cents on the dollar.

We will not go backward. We will go forward. Let us celebrate #InternationalWomensDay with a pledge to defend women's rights. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1206258955908976641/img/FL6SO0Jrz15-TzzI.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1206258955908976641/vid/320x320/_EPZWOpYyqBTtETm.mp4?tag=13
Today I released the following statement: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESn2RSCX0AEYTpF.jpg

RT @RevJJackson We look to our youth for energy, expansion and inclusion which leads to growth. 
The youth that come to these rallies represent hope, healing and promise for our nation. 
It’s a joy to “feel the Bern” with Bernie. Keep Hope Alive! #VotingMatters @BernieSanders http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESm67FmXYAAmWPQ.jpg

NAFTA did not just destroy 1 million American jobs—it forced millions of Mexican family farmers off their land and fueled a migration crisis.

We need a humane immigration system. But we must also end the disastrous corporate trade deals that have devastated Latin America. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESnk5UCU4AAMANg.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1236769570632773632/vid/320x320/H4bQUWIiEXjGWLgz.mp4?tag=13

In commemoration of 55 years since Bloody Sunday, it was a profound privilege to return to Selma to honor the memory of those brave foot soldiers alongside my dear friend John Lewis. May we take this day to recommit to building the beloved community and a more perfect union. -NP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESnz_aMXsAA0A9t.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESnz_aLWsAITFGQ.jpg

On #InternationalWomensDay, Senator Rubio celebrates the countless contributions women have made through the years and is committed to ensuring women have the support to continue to succeed at home and abroad. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESnYIkqWsAEIh3J.jpg
@nbcsnl ok this is legendary

This morning, I announced I’m endorsing Joe Biden for president because we need someone who reflects the decency and dignity of the American people and who fights for those whose voices are too often ignored. https://twitter.com/kamalaharris/status/1236622740930560001 QT @KamalaHarris .@JoeBiden has served our country with dignity and we need him now more than ever. I will do everything in my power to help elect him the next President of the United States. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1236498023485714432/img/7NwYWq0bcKRkHg9g.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1236498023485714432/vid/480x270/bARH5I7jmzu_1tnj.mp4?tag=13

Women in the America and across the world not only deserve full gender equality, but also racial justice, economic justice, social justice and environmental justice. Today and every day we must carry on that fight. #InternationalWomensDay

I just had to give Ruby Bridges a hug today when I saw her in Alabama.

At just 6 years old, she became the first Black child to integrate an all-white public elementary school in Louisiana in 1960. And she needed federal marshals to escort her there. We must never forget. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESnYNqqXQAIWW2_.jpg

A year ago @HouseDemocrats passed the #ForThePeople Act #HR1—a historic anti-corruption bill that among many things would end the influence of big money in politics & make it easier to vote.

@senatemajldr continues to block this critical bill. The Senate must vote.

RT @janeosanders On International Women’s Day, I call on us all to stand for a future that grants women and girls true freedom, dignity, and equality. We can achieve this with a vision for social, economic, racial, and environmental justice rooted in love and compassion. #InternationalWomensDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESmmzU0XYAAFWac.jpg

Ann Arbor! Join me and @AOC at our rally tonight and help us show the billionaire class and corporate elite that our movement is ready to take them on. Doors open at 4:30 p.m. 

RSVP here: https://www.mobilize.us/sandersmi/event/258657/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESmVmaLXkAAsBFM.jpg

Here's the truth people need to understand: to tackle the challenges of the 21st century, we must empower women. And if we do not lift up women, everyone will fall short.

Let's recognize this #InternationalWomensDay that the fight for fairness and equality continues.

Today is a special day for our campaign. Rev. Jesse Jackson is one of the most transformative figures in modern American history and a hero of mine. It is one of the honors of my life to have his support. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESnFSqVXkAAJTCA.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESnFSqUX0AA6GZn.jpg

“I will make of you a great nation, and I will bless you; I will make your name great, so that you will be a blessing. I will bless those who bless you and curse those who curse you. All the families of the earth will find blessing in you.”

Genesis 12:2-3

Today’s Dem Party wages a daily war on jobs. Now “moderate” Biden tells millions of Uber & Lyft drivers their small business must be shut down. I ride Uber often; when I ask the drivers how they like it, they say they love the freedom & the extra $$. Biden would make it illlegal. https://twitter.com/joebiden/status/1236381353811120128 QT @JoeBiden I support #AB5 in California, which will give workers the dignity they deserve in the workplace. I agree with @transportworker that we can't let corporations undermine basic rights by adding these exemptions to ground-breaking legislation. https://www.sfchronicle.com/business/article/Uber-Lyft-DoorDash-campaign-for-ballot-15090479.php#

Today has been a very moving day. Earlier we were with Rev. Jesse Jackson. Tonight we are with Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez. We are seeing the arc of justice that Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. talked about. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1236814250972196864/img/bcg8MIIksyi8bBXI.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1236814250972196864/vid/480x270/LdVxQRR3I7YdlqY7.mp4?tag=13

Today, and every day, we commit ourselves to the ongoing fight for genuine equality for all of the world’s women and girls. #InternationalWomensDay https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/3820 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESmk0FHX0AEUZ9S.jpg

My mom is my hero, and on this #InternationalWomensDay I want to honor her. From planning and participating in sit-ins and marches during the Civil Rights Movement to paving the way for women, especially women of color, in business, she truly has led a life worth celebrating. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESmUYfzXsAAohbt.jpg

The one who supported Jesse Jackson in ‘84 and ‘88

The one who was a leader of CORE and a friend to SNCC. 

The one who actually got arrested fighting racism. 

The one who Rev. Jackson just endorsed for 2020. 

I’m for @BernieSanders.

But...

I hope to be able to vote for Bernie Sanders for president.

If that helps you decide👍. If you disagree, well I'm used to that.🤷
